price: ߦߟߌߘߏ߲߫ ߛߌ߫ ߕߍ߫ ߟߐ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߒ ߡߊ߬ ߸ ߝߏ߫ ߒ ߧߋ߫ ߖߊ߬ߛߙߋ߬ߡߊ߬ߟߌ߬ߟߊ߬ ߘߐ߬ߜߍ ߘߌ߫ ߡߍ߲ ( ߟߊߛߋ ) ߘߐ߫
arabic: إِن يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيَّ إِلَّآ أَنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: in yūḥā ilayya illā annamā anā nadhīrun mubīnun
